Need your urgent support please to finalize this matter ; kindly check this summary and confirm/update us : 

 

 

Orfevrerie Christofle acquired properties in Japan and 3 policies must be taken out :

 

1.	For the stock of Goods and the carriage : Hagop is directly handling this part with Oman Insurance  - please confirm 
2.	For the properties Madame Battini tells us doc 4    Property insurance proposed has been declined – please confirm the non-involvement of Nasco anymore in this policy 

 

 

3.	For the Liability : 

Mail Mrs Battini Doc 4 . Liability Insurance has been in fact subscribed locally, without any link to the master's program or your proposals - please confirm.

We are still waiting for your position in this matter bearing in mind that we have asked AIG France to cover the liability for Japan 

Note that AIG intervenes after the local police have been exhausted.  Liability with AIG France has been cancelled because we did not receive the copy of the local policy in English and the proff of settlement made by a Japanease bank 

Please note that Insurance in Japan is particular , they apply the principle cash before cover clause.

 

Looking forward to receiving your feedback 

 

Diana

Dear All

 

Last year we started preparation of renewal of local insurance, then the group told us that some of the insurances are covered by global policy.

In January, we renewed the Liability Insurance and Comprehensive Commercial Property Insurance locally and started to renewal process with local AIG.

In February, we canceled the local policy of Marine insurance (local AIG) under direction of Christofle HQ.

I received the first email from AIG Europe suddenly on May 9 and I replied on May 12.

 

Please let us know if the Japan cannot be included into the group policy, do we need to contact local AIG again to make a contract as we did before?

 

Best regards,

 

Yoshiko Kusano

Christofle Japan

2F, 5-10-6, Minami-Aoyama, Minato-ku, 107-0062, Japan

080-4367-8056

Thank you for your email .

 

Above again the 2 pdfs.

 

Please note that the marine insurance for Christofle Japan is duly included in the master policy both for domestic and international shipments. 

Reply : Well noted.

 

*   As we have communicated with HQ, we have only property insurance and product liability insurance locally. We do not have business interruption insurance locally, and perhaps it is covered by HQ globally.

Reply : Well noted but you must include for the properties listed above the BI ; we cannot put in place a separate policy . please see with M Ghazarian. This guarantee is very important . 

 

*   According to all the above information, the only certificate of settlement that can be submitted from Japan is the property insurance and product liability insurance.

Please let me know if you need these documents. 

Reply : Well noted as it is two standalone policies handled locally and for the sake of good order, let us have copies of the policies in English. 

 

Furthermore, please note that you must put in place an “OPERATING CIVIL LIABILITY” for all the locations and let us have a copy in English to be able to inform AIG.

They have chased us several times. 

 

I remain at your disposal for any info needed and look forward to hearing back from you,

All the best.

 

Joe Nasr

please  see doc 1 

 

The management of Orfevrerie Christofle in France informed us that everything must go through them, which is contrary to underwriting regulations in Japan. 

In Japan, the local structure should contact the local broker directly so that the latter can set up the contract, with settlement being made on a cash-before-cover basis and by wire transfer from a Japanese bank. 

 

All these information’s has been communicated to Christofle's management.

 

Our Manager in Dubai Mr. Hrishikesh Oturkar in the loop will contact M Ghazarian ( Manager of Orfevrerie Christofle in Dubai) to explain the process.

Dear All

 

Last year we started preparation of renewal of local insurance, then the group told us that some of the insurances are covered by global policy.

In January, we renewed the Liability Insurance and Comprehensive Commercial Property Insurance locally and started to renewal process with local AIG.

In February, we canceled the local policy of Marine insurance (local AIG) under direction of Christofle HQ.

I received the first email from AIG Europe suddenly on May 9 and I replied on May 12.

 

Please let us know if the Japan cannot be included into the group policy, do we need to contact local AIG again to make a contract as we did before?

 

Best regards,

Dear Mr Kusano,

Thank you for your email .

Reply : Well noted.

 

*   As we have communicated with HQ, we have only property insurance and product liability insurance locally. We do not have business interruption insurance locally, and perhaps it is covered by HQ globally.

*   As we have communicated with HQ, we have only property insurance and product liability insurance locally. We do not have business interruption insurance locally, and perhaps it is covered by HQ globally.

Reply : Well noted but you must include for the properties listed above the BI ; we cannot put in place a separate policy . please see with M Ghazarian. This guarantee is very important .

 

*   According to all the above information, the only certificate of settlement that can be submitted from Japan is the property insurance and product liability insurance.

Please let me know if you need these documents.

Reply : Well noted as it is two standalone policies handled locally and for the sake of good order, let us have copies of the policies in English.

 

Furthermore, please note that you must put in place an “OPERATING CIVIL LIABILITY” for all the locations and let us have a copy in English to be able to inform AIG.

They have chased us several times.
